reviews.review_text: This is a great option instead of going to a salon! The color is natural and neutral. Love this product!

reviews.title: Fabulous- love OPI!
reviews.review_text: This is one of my most favorite colors by OPI and my go to for Fall %26 Winter. Bought it so I would always have my color when it's time to redo my nails. Took it to my nail person and they used it on me. It looks great and last for weeks.

reviews.title: Fast shipping, great product, wonderful seller
reviews.review_text: Super fast shipping and fantastic product! This nail powder stays on longer than SNS and this color is between bubble bath and white, perfect color for summer or anytime. Great seller-save to your faves!

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: This is one of my most favorite colors by OPI and my go to for Spring %26 Summer. Bought it so I would always have my color when it's time to redo my nails. Took it to my nail person and they used it on me. It looks great and last for weeks.

reviews.title: Not as expected
reviews.review_text: Not as sheer as expected but overall a good product.
Do not buy! Looks absolutely NOTHING like the color of the polish.

reviews.title: Fake product - TWICE
reviews.review_text: Purchased this TWICE and both times got the wrong color. Paid for Lisbon and got Love is Bare. I tried it and hated it so much, had to go back to the salon for a change. Please don't let certain sellers sell your products with fakes.

reviews.title: Not the same iconic color as liquid
reviews.review_text: I sought this color powder out since it is my all time fav and was soooo disappointed that it hardly resembles the non-powder color at all. It has no shimmer at all and is a deeper red overall. OPI really missed the mark on this one and are still commanding top dollar. Spend your money on another color, possibly another brand all together. Additionally, the base coat was excessively thick compared to similar products by other manufacturers, making application difficult. Come on OPI, step it up. Lesser quality brands are surpassing you with the powder products.

reviews.title: Wrong color received, and possible fake?
reviews.review_text: Received different color than ordered. Also, I'm pretty sure this is a fake and not authentic OPI dipping powder.

reviews.title: Color doesn't match lacquer
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing Cajun Shrimp lacquer and gel for years, and love this color because of the coral/orange undertones. Unfortunately the dip powder is not the same color - not even close. It's a much deeper red, without any trace of coral. Hopefully OPI can reformulate this one and create an accurate color match,

reviews.title: Not like the regular polish
reviews.review_text: As Becca mentioned in her review, the dip does not have the shimmer that the regular polish does. I was not happy that I had to wear it for 2 weeks.

reviews.title: Agreed, Color does not match the polisj!
reviews.review_text: I love the orange in the original Cajun shrimp- my go to for my toes. HOwever i went to my salon and asked for the polish on my toes and dip on my hands and they are completely different colors. Like the other reviewer said, the powder has hardly any orange/coral in it and appears as a true red, while the polish is still the same red/coral i love.

reviews.title: Darker than original polish
reviews.review_text: Yet another "matching" dip color that is darker than the regular polish. I'm going to stop wearing the matching dips because they need some work and it drives my OCD crazy having to wear them until my next appointment. I love OPI but a LOT of these dip powders do not match.

reviews.title: Disappointed!
reviews.review_text: I was so excited my salon carried OPI SNS, especially in this color for the holidays. I’m sorely disappointed. It is nothing like the traditional nail polish - which I have used for years - and now I’m stuck with it for weeks and it doesn’t shimmer! It’s way too dark.

reviews.title: Dip color is different
reviews.review_text: Cajun shrimp is my all time favorite color. Unfortunately the dip formula comes out more “holiday red” with a dark tone than “summer red” with the brightness Cajun shrimp is famous for. Please please please fix this! Thank you!

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Disappointed in this color. I was hoping it would be the same as the polish. Unfortunately is has very minimal shimmer hardly any compared to the polish.

reviews.title: Red not Cajun
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite OPI color. I’m going on vacation and of course picked it. My nails look like Christmas red and my toes look like Cajun shrimp. What happened?? The dip is not the same color at all.

reviews.title: Perfect fall color!
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this color for fall! Dont care about it matching the traditional nail polish, it looks great!

reviews.title: Love love love this colour!
reviews.review_text: I wear "Lost On Lombard" polish on my toes and this powder on my nails matches beautifully...
